THTTPIndyHelper Properties

Properties
 NameDescription
CookieList

Represents property CookieList.

HandleSketchyRedirects

Not all responses which send a Location header are redirected through the TIdHTTP component because only redirects with a specific ResponseCode are addressed.

By default this is True and after a POST-request the unhandled  Location or Response header is processed by a additional GET-request.

LastRedirect

Represents property LastRedirect.

Response_Refresh

This additional header information is similar to the Location header.

UseCompressor

Represents property UseCompressor.
